description: Spawner V2 - Cloud-native MCP server for AI-powered development

skill_creation_workflow.description: Two paths to create world-class skills

quick.when: You know exactly what skill you want

deep.description: Brainstorm first, then automate the rest
deep.when: You want to deeply explore and add your personal touch

tools.name: spawner_plan
tools.description: Plan and create new projects (discover + recommend + create)

tools.description: Analyze existing codebase for stack/skill recommendations

tools.name: spawner_load
tools.description: Load project context and relevant skills

tools.name: spawner_skill_brainstorm
tools.description: OPTIONAL: Deep exploration before skill creation. Name inspirational figures, walk through pitfalls, add your personal touch. Outputs feed into spawner_skill_research.

areas.identity: The Expert - who inspires this skill
areas.boundaries: Stay in Your Lane - focus vs. hand off

tools.description: Research phase for skill creation. Accepts optional brainstorm_insights from spawner_skill_brainstorm. Gathers pain points, expert content, ecosystem mapping.

tools.name: spawner_skill_new
tools.description: Create world-class skills with 4 YAML files

tools.name: spawner_skill_score
tools.description: Score skill against 100-point quality rubric (80 min to ship)

tools.name: spawner_skill_upgrade
tools.description: Enhance existing skills with targeted improvements

tools.name: spawner_setup
tools.description: Onboarding and configuration helper. Check setup status, get tool setup guides, verify requirements for skills and agents.
